channel.title: How to add "sell all" option [PI] insidiax v1
channel.description: Hey guys i have been looking almost everywhere for this tutorial, And cant seem to find it. On my server i want to be able to "sell all" to shopkeeper. EXAMPLE: i woodcutted 900 magic logs and i want to sell them to shopkeeper, on this base im using it only allows me to sell 10 at a time. I want to be able to sell all so when i right click on the noted item to hit sell all or sell 500 atleast. However i cannot find a tutorial on how to do this, so if someone could please comment or show me how to do it, it would be wonderful. the source i am using is: "insidiax v1" and the client is also "insidiax v1" Thankyou guys.

item.title: How to add "sell all" option [PI] insidiax v1
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

arham 4:

Do the hokey poky.

That might help also.

item.title: How to add "sell all" option [PI] insidiax v1
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

brackets are often what does the errors…
Anyways~~

Instead of Adding new amount to sell at once, change ‘‘Sell 10’’ to ‘‘Sell X’’ and then server sided go and switch amount of 10 to whatever you want.

Newbie Way

Read full topic

item.title: How to add "sell all" option [PI] insidiax v1
item.dc:creator: @bob2568 bob2568
item.description:
@bob2568 wrote:

All errors can easily be fixed by simply reading what’s happening, most of the time it’s simple mistake like forgetting brackets, closing statements, or simply spacing somewhere you shouldn’t have. Post your errors & we will see what’s going on.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add "sell all" option [PI] insidiax v1

item.title: How to add "sell all" option [PI] insidiax v1
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

[quote=“Jayden., post:11, topic:523819”]This problem has nothing to do with clickingbuttons.java.

Because you ask it nice

Search in RSInterface.java for

if(rsInterface.itemActions[l3].length() == 0) rsInterface.itemActions[l3] = null;

and under that add:

if(rsInterface.parentID == 3824) rsInterface.itemActions[4] = "Buy X";

This will add Buy X under the Buy 10 option.

That’s it for client sided, now in your server files.

in your packets open BankX1.java and add this:

if (XinterfaceID == 3900) { //Shop if (EnteredAmount <= 10000) c.getShops().buyItem(XremoveID, XremoveSlot, EnteredAmount); else c.sendMessage("You cannot buy more than 10k items at a time."); }

Now in ShopAssistant.java search for

and add this above:

if (amount > 100) { TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(getItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot))*amount; Slot = c.getItems().getItemSlot(995); if (Slot == -1 && TotPrice2 != 0) { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough coins."); } if(TotPrice2 <= 1) { TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(getItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot)); } if (TotPrice2 <= 0) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { c.getItems().addItem(itemID, amount); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("Not enough space in your inventory."); } } else if (c.playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { c.getItems().deleteItem(995, c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), TotPrice2); c.getItems().addItem(itemID, amount); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= amount; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("Not enough space in your inventory."); } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough coins."); } }else{

Now at the end of the BuyItem method in ShopAssistant you still need to add above

add

This took me 10 minutes to write up, I believe there should be some errors.[/quote]
thanks for taking your time to write that, but saddly i got quite alot of errors server sided, and i guess it was errors i could not fix myself but it is okay hopefully someone will be able to help, thanks alot tho for your time.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add "sell all" option [PI] insidiax v1

item.title: How to add "sell all" option [PI] insidiax v1
item.dc:creator: @Jayden2 Jayden.
item.description:
@Jayden2 wrote:

This problem has nothing to do with clickingbuttons.java.

Because you ask it nice

Search in RSInterface.java for

if(rsInterface.itemActions[l3].length() == 0) rsInterface.itemActions[l3] = null;

and under that add:

if(rsInterface.parentID == 3824) rsInterface.itemActions[4] = "Buy X";

This will add Buy X under the Buy 10 option.

That’s it for client sided, now in your server files.

in your packets open BankX1.java and add this:

if (XinterfaceID == 3900) { //Shop if (EnteredAmount <= 10000) c.getShops().buyItem(XremoveID, XremoveSlot, EnteredAmount); else c.sendMessage("You cannot buy more than 10k items at a time."); }

Now in ShopAssistant.java search for

and add this above:

if (amount > 100) { TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(getItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot))*amount; Slot = c.getItems().getItemSlot(995); if (Slot == -1 && TotPrice2 != 0) { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough coins."); } if(TotPrice2 <= 1) { TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(getItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot)); } if (TotPrice2 <= 0) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { c.getItems().addItem(itemID, amount); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("Not enough space in your inventory."); } } else if (c.playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { c.getItems().deleteItem(995, c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), TotPrice2); c.getItems().addItem(itemID, amount); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= amount; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("Not enough space in your inventory."); } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough coins."); } }else{

Now at the end of the BuyItem method in ShopAssistant you still need to add above

add

This took me 10 minutes to write up, I believe there should be some errors.

Read full topic

took me couple minutes on google

[/quote]

so it doesnt say “sell all” just; eg.20 but you can sell all?[/quote]

not it just shows the “sell all” option but it doesnt sell anything
